Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: This sounds like a utility that an operator may want to implement using the existing Fabric config library. I wouldn't expect the Fabric project to actually deliver such a utility. Therefore I'll close the Jira issue for now. If there are specific gaps in Fabric project that need to be filled in order to create such a utility (e.g. extensions to the config library), then we can open separate Jira items for those.
